meanings.definition: A mixture of young salad greens, typically including arugula, endive, and radicchio.
meanings.sent1: I love the fresh taste of mescluns in my salad.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a delicious salad with mescluns as the base.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit snuck into the garden and devoured all the mescluns!
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a mescluns of colors, blending together beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the mescluns made the salad look like a work of art.
